Katharina Kohse-Höinghaus (amụrụ na 18 Disemba 1951) bụ onye Germani na-emepụta kemịkal.

Kohse-Höinghaus gụrụ Chemistry na Mahadum Ruhr Bochum site na afo 1970 ruo  na afo 1975. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ doctorate ya na Mahadum Ruhr Bochum na 1978 na ebe obibi ya na Machịum Stuttgart na 1992. Kemgbe afọ 1994, ọ bụ prọfesọ maka kemịkalụ anụ ahụ na Mahadum Bielefeld.  O guzobere otu n'ime ụlọ nyocha mbụ maka ụlọ akwụkwọ. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Institut nke na ahụ maka combushon  n'etiti afọ 2012 na 2016.
Nnyocha ya na-elekwasị anya na nchọpụta ọkụ site na iji laser spectroscopy na mass spectrometry, ntinye nke ihe ndị na-arụ ọrụ site na gas-phase, na nyocha nke usoro na-emeghachi omume.
Ọ natara onyinye na ndị otu ndị a:
